en-US.summary: Have Alexa tell you when your next trash day (for Oklahoma City only)
examplePhrases: Alexa open Oklahoma City trash day
Alexa start Oklahoma City trash day
Alexa ask Oklahoma City trash day when is my next recycling day
en-US.name: Oklahoma City Trash Day
en-US.description: Tell Alexa your Oklahoma City Address. She can then tell you your next trash, recycling, and big-trash day.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Use the address 3705 Windscape Ave for a valid address
